structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Protection of employees under civil service.
law.text: Nothing in KRS 64.480 to 64.740 is intended to supersede any existing provision of law with respect to protection of employees under civil service against reduction of compensation.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 31, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 33.
